title: A good way to balance voidsins imo
body: I think a very good way to balance void sins while still being viable is to make kassadin cost 2g instead of 1g. In this case if 2 r trying to do this strat there's more risk as they fight at lower chances plus 2 g Kass means more strategy about economy and hp instead of just face rolling at 40 gold after krugs and start not losing hp at all. If riot is worried that this removes the only 1 g sorc in the game then just make tf cost 1 g and Kass 2 g as I think tf's power suits a 1g unit

replies.body:
Kassadin falls late game a lot even with 3 best items. I sold 3 stars kassadin to put items on other unit late game.
But I agree he is OP with 2 items early game.
They're changing Void next patch to work like Imperials.  (2) gives one random void true damage, (4) gives all void true damage.
